title: When wil the new public boat ramp open in Hampstead?
text:
Tammy,



Dave Ennis found your answer.



HereÍs a progress report from Pender County Manager Rick BentonÍs
weekly update Sept. 16:



The Wildlilfe Resources Commission (WRC) plans for construction to
begin on the new public access ramp in Hampstead at the end of Lewis
Road October 1. This has been a long overdue project and it will be
great to get it underway and open for the 2012 spring season.
